bpp/descriptor.name: Adya
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Adya is a universal open-source platform for commerce and supply chain. With its Platform-as-a-Service and integration-Platform-as-a-service capabilities, Siva is a truly interoperable solution, with more than 100 ready-made solutions at the door.

descriptor.name: Desi Store
descriptor.short_desc: Bagmane Constellation Business Park Block-7, Ferns City, Doddanekkundi, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560048
descriptor.long_desc: Bagmane Constellation Business Park Block-7, Ferns City, Doddanekkundi, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560048

descriptor.name: URBN 20000 mAh Lithium_Polymer 22.5W Super Fast Charging Ultra Compact Power Bank with Quick Charge & Power Delivery, Type C Input/Output, Made in India, Type C Cable Included (Camo)
descriptor.short_desc: Superfast Charging Power Bank: With the URBN 20,000mAh 22.5W power bank, experience lightning-fast charging for your devices. Charge your mobile phone from 0 to 50% in just 30 minutes, thanks to the quick charge feature and dual output ports (1 USB-A and 1 Type-C).
descriptor.long_desc:
Advanced Dual Type-C Power Delivery: Enjoy the convenience of dual Type-C ports that support both input and output. The power bank features Power Delivery technology, ensuring optimal charging efficiency for your devices. Experience 50% faster two-way fast charging for your smartphones, tablets, and more.
Compact and Portable Design: Designed with portability in mind, this ultra-compact power bank is perfect for on-the-go use. Its sleek and lightweight design allows you to carry it anywhere, ensuring you never run out of battery power while traveling, working, or exploring.
Universal Compatibility and Smart Adaptive IC: This power bank is universally compatible with a wide range of devices, including smartphones, tablets, Bluetooth headphones, and more. The smart adaptive IC technology provides 12 layers of circuit protection, safeguarding your devices against overcharging, overheating, and short circuits.

descriptor.name: Logitech M221 Wireless Mouse, Silent Buttons, 2.4 GHz with USB Mini Receiver, 1000 DPI Optical Tracking, 18-Month Battery Life, Ambidextrous PC/Mac/Laptop - Charcoal Grey
descriptor.short_desc: Comfortable mobile shape is small enough to toss in a bag and an ambidextrous design guides either hand into a natural position
descriptor.long_desc:
USB Receiver is provided with the mouse and can be found in the small rectangular slot next to the battery compartment. Flip the mouse and slide the battery cover off to locate the receiver
Mouse automatically connects to your computer via a tiny wireless Receiver that Plugs into your computer’s USB port
Reliable, long range wireless mouse works up to 33 feet away from your computer (Actual wireless range may vary based on use, settings, and environmental conditions)
18-Month battery life and auto sleep help you go longer between battery changes (battery life may vary based on user and computing conditions)
Ultra-quiet mouse with 90% reduced click sound and same click feel eliminates noise and distractions for you and others around you
